short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fill your new tab with live wallpapers of space!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Space Start Page - Live Wallpapers is not just an enhancement to your browser; it's a gateway to a serene, efficient, and personalized space odyssey every time you open a new tab. Escape the mundane and embrace the tranquility of the cosmos with this unique and captivating extension.
"By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install "Space Start Page" extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the services in terms of use"

Features:

★ Live Space Wallpapers: Immerse yourself in the wonders of the cosmos with each new tab. Our extension features dynamic, live space wallpapers that bring the beauty and tranquility of the universe directly to your screen.

★ Date and time: Your watch and date directly to your home page with smooth live update of hours, minutes and seconds .

★ Static Space Image Wallpapers: Choose from a stunning collection of static space-themed images. Tailor your browsing backdrop to your mood by selecting from various celestial bodies, galaxies, and starry scenes.

★ Shortcut Customization: Effortlessly add and manage shortcuts to your most-visited websites. This feature integrates seamlessly with your cosmic backdrop, providing quick access to your online universe without disrupting the tranquility of your space scene.

★ Custom Wallpaper Uploads: Personalize your new tab even further by uploading your own space-themed images. This allows you to orbit around your favorite celestial scenes or memories of the night sky.
